references.reason: This paper is foundational to the understanding of GPT-4, a large language model that is critical to the development of many of the techniques and models described in the subject paper.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Llama, an open-source large language model, that is used as a base for several of the models discussed in the subject paper.

references.paper_title: Rt-2: Vision-language-action models transfer web knowledge to robotic control
references.reason: This paper introduces RT-2, a vision-language-action model that is particularly relevant to the subject paper's focus on robotic control.

references.paper_title: Vision-language foundation models as effective robot imitators
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the subject paper's use of vision-language models for robotic control.

references.paper_title: Calvin: A benchmark for language-conditioned policy learning for long-horizon robot manipulation tasks
references.reason: This paper introduces the CALVIN benchmark, which is used to evaluate several of the models presented in the subject paper.
